FuncDef: This command displays tunnel operation information.
CLIs: tunnels [ <local-ipip-address> ] [ remote-ip <ip-address> ] [ isa-group <wlan-gw-group-id> ] [ member [ <1> <to> <255> ] ] [ summary ] [ detail ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the local IP address of this system that is the destination IP address in the tunnel header of received packets.
Specifies the remote IP address of the Mobile Gateway that is the source IP address in the tunnel header of received packets.
Specifies the identifier of the WLAN gateway ISA group that terminates GRE for this group interface. Values-1 to 4.
Specifies the identifier of this WLAN gateway ISA group membe. Values-1 to 255.
Displays a summary of the specified parameter.
Displays information for the specified user equipment.
